rob Le Cates

Members of the University Professionals of Illinois socialize before the negotiation team meets with Easterns negotiation team at Booth Library Monday afternoon PERIOD

Madelyn Kidd News EditorMarch  

Easterns chapter of the University Professionals of Illinois EIUUPI met with the universitys negotiation team Monday afternoon to begin bargaining for  proposals in a new fouryear contract in the Edgar Room in Booth Library PERIOD

Every four years EIUUPI has a negotiation team bargain for proposals to be added to the new contract PERIOD This year EIUUPI is bargaining for  proposals and met with Easterns negotiation team at  p.m PERIOD Monday PERIOD

Prior to the meeting members of EIUUPI gathered at  p.m PERIOD with shirts and flyers to rally support for the EIUUPI negotiation team and awareness to students about the desired contract proposals PERIOD

Jennifer Stringfellow the president of EIUUPI and professor of special education was one of the members at the rally outside Booth Library at the North entrance before the meeting began PERIOD

Today were here to support our negotiating team that is going to present our bargains to the administration so we want to support them Stringfellow said PERIOD We want to make a big scene as much as we can to let our administration know that the union is in support of this. eIUUPI represents a large variety of employees on campus including professors academic advisors annually contracted faculty the tenured and tenuretrack faculty and academic support professionals PERIOD

Billy Hung a professor of biological sciences and leading EIUUPI negotiation team said EIUUPI is looking to answer questions from Easterns negotiation team and addressed the proposals EIUUPI has to improve work conditions PERIOD

In our union theres the tenure contracted faculty the annually contracted faculty and the academic support professionals Hung said PERIOD So each of them has work condition improvement that we want to get and of course part of that is changes in our compensation package. the compensation loss comes from inflation in recent years and the university not having the money to give any raises PERIOD

Were actually dealing with a  percent wage loss so were trying to recover that through this process Hung said PERIOD

Hung gave an opening statement which highlighted the most important proposals of the  presented to Easterns negotiating team PERIOD

First listed was a proposal to improve job security for the Annually Contracted Faculty ACF members PERIOD

The ACF members at EIU serve a core and indispensable role in delivering instructions to our students particularly for beginning first and secondyear students. a proposal for the Academic Support Professional members was made for an offered greater autonomy and clearer accountability in their work plans PERIOD

The most important proposal for the tenured and tenuretrack faculty was for the decreasing numbers of tenured and tenuretrack faculty in departments to be addressed and resolved PERIOD

A compensation package seeked in the proposal package included acrosstheboard raises meritbased raises for both units as well as changes in the compensation rate for overload credit units. the negotiation teams for EIUUPI and Easterns meeting lasted around two hours and is only the first of multiple meetings to negotiate PERIOD

Today is the first time we present our side of the proposal to them Hung said PERIOD So we will listen to their questions answer whatever questions they have give them time to think about it and then they will give us their feedback PERIOD And we go back and forth from there so today is just the very beginning of presenting our proposal. madelyn Kidd can be reached at  or at emailprotected PERIOD



Madelyn Kidd is a senior public affairs reporting major PERIOD She previously served as EditorinChief of The Navigator at Lake Land College then managing editor.. PERIOD
